availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Archibald C. McBeath (Grayson County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, physician. Tennessee native. Married to Margaret McBeath. Father of Thomas R. McBeath, Susan E. McBeath, Lewis P. McBeath, and Mary E. McBeath. School teacher in Wayne County, Kentucky. School teacher in Grayson County. School teacher in Adair County, Kentucky. Physician in Grayson County 1844 to 1870. Commissioner of the common schools in Grayson County. Justice of the peace in Grayson County. County judge in Grayson County.

bibl.p: W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State (Louisville: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 1114. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 5B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Litchfield, p. 1. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Litchfield, p. 4.
